${ModID}:Shelling.NAME: Shelling
${ModID}:Shelling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, and !${ModID}:sd! damage to a random other enemy. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Shell.

${ModID}:Suppress.NAME: Suppress
${ModID}:Suppress.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Target loses !${ModID}:m2! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:BallisticStrike.NAME: Ballistic Strike
${ModID}:BallisticStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Double damage on enemies who intend to attack.

${ModID}:DefensePlanning.NAME: Defense Planning
${ModID}:DefensePlanning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you don't have ${ModID}:Blur, gain !M! ${ModID}:Blur.

${ModID}:Logistics.NAME: Logistics
${ModID}:Logistics.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Vulnerable or Frail or Weak in that order. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Shell. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards.
${ModID}:Logistics.FLAVOR: They really make everything run smoother.

${ModID}:ThinkTwice.NAME: Think Twice
${ModID}:ThinkTwice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block for each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:Shrapnel.NAME: Shrapnel
${ModID}:Shrapnel.DESCRIPTION: Your attacks apply 1 Vulnerable and 2 ${ModID}:Ignite per 10 unblocked damage.
${ModID}:Shrapnel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Your attacks apply 1 Vulnerable and 2 ${ModID}:Ignite per 10 unblocked damage.

${ModID}:ShellForge.NAME: Shell Forge
${ModID}:ShellForge.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Shells provide an additional !M! damage. NL At the start of your turn, gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Shell.
${ModID}:ShellForge.FLAVOR: Like a bakery but for explosives.

${ModID}:DigIn.NAME: Dig In
${ModID}:DigIn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! ${ModID}:Blur. NL After the start of your turn, if you have Block, gain [E] .
${ModID}:DigIn.FLAVOR: Looks like a nice spot to set up camp.

${ModID}:Prevail.NAME: Prevail
${ModID}:Prevail.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal at least 9 damage in a single hit, the enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.
